summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It includes information on debits, credits, and service charges, highlighting various transactions made during the month.

persons.name: Paul Mavis
persons.context: Paul Mavis is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of April 1, 2016, was $323,784.78.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2016, was $289,863.77.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made throughout April, including payroll fees and health premiums.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
